function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased anxiety and panic due to repetitive alerts","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Concerns regarding individual rights and privacy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on mass video surveillance for monitoring social distancing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High reliance on deep learning-based solutions for monitoring social distancing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential normalization of mass surveillance in a sustainable smart city scenario","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using yolo for social distancing monitoring without considering its limitations and potential pitfalls","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of pedestrian detections and social distancing indicators","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overreliance on single-model performance without considering the context and limitations of other detection models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Noisy precision / recall curve may make it difficult to estimate model performance for object detection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Change in computation method for ap by pascal voc challenge may lead to discrepancies in model evaluation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of multiple detection models may lead to varied performance results and difficulty in comparing model effectiveness.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of threshold for classification based on iou","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"False positive predictions due to iou threshold","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"False negative predictions due to iou threshold","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pedestrians violating social distancing guidelines","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate object detection leading to incorrect measurements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of the mouse click event for selecting roi may introduce the risk of contamination through shared surfaces.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilization of pedestrian detection models may lead to increased interaction with potentially infected individuals during data collection.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of shared gpu resources in the google colab environment may pose a risk of exposure to contagious diseases through shared computational resources.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential violation of social distancing norms due to close proximity of pedestrians","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate pedestrian detection and distance calculation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on public dataset for evaluation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity of pedestrians","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of surveillance data for monitoring physical distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intrusive alerting system","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perspective transformation of video feed","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of privacy in social distancing monitoring may not be acceptable for many individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases if social distancing measures are not effectively monitored","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on deep learning technology and pre-trained models for medical diagnosis and other critical tasks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data-driven approach development for covid-19 clustering algorithm","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decentralized iot-based system for regulating population flow during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social distancing monitoring schemes using robots and surveillance technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Computer vision-based monitoring without privacy protection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of statistical analysis and deployment direction for social distancing monitoring approach","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of mass video surveillance system without clear ethical guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of video surveillance for monitoring crowded areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enforcement of social distancing through technology","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious diseases may spread if people gather in close proximity to study the schematics together.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of large image datasets may lead to privacy concerns and potential misuse of data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social media event analysis may lead to the spread of misinformation and panic in the population.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mass video surveillance may lead to concerns regarding the centralized collection and storage of sensitive data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mass video surveillance for social distancing monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of individuals with disease symptoms through video surveillance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Real-time monitoring of physical contacts between individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of iot devices for data-driven services may increase the risk of contagion spread due to physical interaction with diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in implementing social distancing measures at an early stage of the
